author: jtyberg
msg: FileUploader: Add support for cookies and custom HTTP parameters.  Remove progress callback.

author: jtyberg
msg: FileReader: add media type to readAsDataURL result.

author: jtyberg
msg: Primary use case is uploading images taken by camera, but generic enough to use for other purposes.
Uses multipart HTTP request.  Currently limited to single file per request.

author: jtyberg
msg: Add support for lifecycle events: onPause, onResume, onunload.

author: jtyberg
msg: Add lifecycle event support to Plugins.
Refactor plugin code.  Minor changes.  Mostly renaming classes and adding comments to clear things up.
